original_title: Cap'n O.G Readmore's Puss in Boots
overview: Cap'n O.G. Readmore, who regales his library friends Kitty Literature, Ol' Tome Cat, Wordsy and Lickety Page with the humorous and witty tale of his great-great-great-great-grandfather, the legendary Puss in Boots.
title: Cap'n O.G Readmore's Puss in Boots
